article_title: How Medicare Is Punishing Hospitals That Care For Poor People

article_metadata.author: Peter Ubel

og.description: Such a no-brainer: If patients who receive care at Hospital A are more likely to get readmitted to the hospital 10, 20 or 30 days after discharge than patients in Hospital B, then Hospital A must be doing something wrong. Perhaps clinicians at that hospital are less adept at diagnosing [...]
